source_sentence: 佛說百佛名經
translation: Sutra on the Teaching of the Names of One Hundred Buddhas

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: Translated by the Sui translation of the Tripiṭaka of India, translated by Nārayaśas

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園，與大比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: Thus I have heard. At one time the Buddha was staying at Jeta’s Grove in Sāvatthī, in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Park, accompanied by a great assembly of monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen:

source_sentence: 大菩薩眾，及大諸天、帝釋天王、大梵天王、四天大王，天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽，
translation: The great assembly of bodhisattvas, as well as the great gods, Indra, Brahmā, Mahābrahmā, and the four heavenly kings, devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas.

source_sentence: 人、非人等，無量百千大眾，前後圍繞，恭敬供養，尊重讚歎。
translation: Hundreds of thousands of people, both human and nonhuman, surrounded by hundreds of thousands of assembled crowds in front and behind the Buddha, venerated him with offerings of respect and praised him.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊為諸大眾宣說妙法。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān explained the marvelous teaching for the masses.

source_sentence: 時，尊者舍利弗即從坐起，整理衣服，右膝著地，合十指掌，而白佛言：「唯願世尊，
translation: Then Venerable Sāriputta rose from his seat, arranged his clothes, knelt with his right knee on the ground, joined his palms with ten fingers, and said to the Buddha:

source_sentence: 演說十方現在世界諸佛名號。
translation: He teaches the names of the buddhas of the present worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 若有善男子、善女人，聞是現在諸佛名者，生大功德，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sons and daughters of a virtuous family who hear the names of these buddhas of the present, they will give rise to great merit and set their minds on unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 得不退轉，亦當速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: Attaining nonretrogression, they'll also quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告舍利弗：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Śāriputra, Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝今為欲利益安樂諸大眾故，覆護憐愍諸眾生故，令諸眾生所求滿故，
translation: Because you want to bring benefit and comfort to the masses, because you protect sentient beings with compassion and cause them to fulfill what they seek.

source_sentence: 欲令一切生歡喜故，亦為未來諸菩薩等增善根故，善哉，善哉！
translation: It's because they want to cause all to rejoice, and it's also because future enlightening beings will increase their good roots in the future. Good, good!

source_sentence: 生善覺觀，作如是問。
translation: He gives rise to the contemplation of good awakening and asks this question.

source_sentence: 如是問者，皆是如來威神之力。
translation: Such questions are all the result of the Tathāgata's authoritative power.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 汝今諦聽，若有善男子、善女人，聞是現在諸佛名號，能受持者，一切魔眾於是人所不得其便，
translation: Listen attentively. If there are any sons or daughters of a virtuous family who hear the names of the buddhas of the present and are able to receive and uphold them, all the Māras won’t be able to get an advantage over such people.

source_sentence: 一切惡人亦不得便，獲得無量無邊甚深功德，隨所生處具菩薩行，得宿命通，
translation: All evil people also did not get an opportunity to attain immeasurable, boundless, and profound virtue. Wherever they were born, they fulfilled the practices of enlightening beings and attained supernormal knowledge of past lives.

source_sentence: 顏容端正、眾相具足，常得親近、供養諸佛，乃至速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Their countenance is correct and endowed with all characteristics, they always associate with and honor the buddhas, and quickly attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有聞是諸佛名號，受持讀誦、恭敬禮拜、書寫供養、展轉教他，所得功德無量無邊。」
translation: If someone hears these names of the buddhas, memorizes them, recites them, venerates them, writes and makes offerings to them, and teaches them in turn, the merit they attain will be immeasurable and limitless.

source_sentence: 「若能持此佛名者，　　此人不為刀所傷，
translation: If one can preserve the name of this buddha, they won’t be harmed by a sword.

source_sentence: 毒不能害、火不燒，　　亦不墮於八難中；
translation: The poison cannot harm, the fire cannot burn, Nor does it fall into the eight difficulties.

source_sentence: 得見大智金色光，　　三十二相諸法王，
translation: They will see the golden light of great knowledge, The thirty-two marks of the king of all teachings.

source_sentence: 既得見於諸佛已，　　無量供養彼諸佛。
translation: Having seen the Buddhas, They make infinite offerings to those buddhas.

source_sentence: 其目不盲、不赤黃，　　身不傴曲、不一眼，
translation: Their eyes are not blind or red or yellow, And their bodies are not crooked or curved, Nor do they have one eye.

source_sentence: 得那羅延大力身，　　受持佛名報如是。
translation: Attaining the great body of Nārayana, he receives the name of the Buddha and receives his reward like this.

source_sentence: 常得天龍及夜叉、　　乾闥婆等所供養，
translation: They always receive offerings from devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, and so forth.

source_sentence: 怨家惡人不能害，　　受持佛名報如是。
translation: Enemies and bad people can't harm them, but the reward for upholding the Buddha's name is like this.

source_sentence: 汝今諦聽，舍利弗！　　如我所說微妙語，
translation: Listen attentively now, Sāriputta: just as I have explained it to you in subtle terms.

source_sentence: 若有聞此佛名者，　　則得近於菩提道。
translation: If there is anyone who hears the name of this buddha, They’ll attain near enlightenment.

source_sentence: 是故汝今至心聽，　　十方世界大法王，
translation: For this reason you should listen attentively, O great king of truth, To all the teachings of the buddhas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 能拔眾生煩惱刺，　　譬如藥樹除眾病，
translation: They can pull out the thorns of afflictions in sentient beings, Like a medicinal tree curing all illnesses.

source_sentence: 愚癡盲瞑凡夫等，　　施與菩薩智慧眼；
translation: Giving to ignorant, blind, and dumb worldlings They give enlightening beings the eye of knowledge.

source_sentence: 又如行施勝菩薩，　　無量千億恒沙界，
translation: Also, like the best bodhisattva practicing charity, Measureless thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddha-worlds.

source_sentence: 於中悉滿閻浮金，　　晝夜六時無休息，
translation: They are all filled with the gold of Jambudvīpa, Day and night at six o’clock without cease.

source_sentence: 施與大悲大導師；　　又以栴檀滿百剎，
translation: He gave it to the Great Guide of Great Compassion and filled a hundred buddha-lands with sandalwood.

source_sentence: 幡蓋衣服如恒沙，　　無量千萬億劫中，
translation: Their banners, canopies, and robes are like the sands of the Ganges River For immeasurable thousands of myriads of koṭis of kalpas.

source_sentence: 一心而以用布施；　　復於一佛國土中，
translation: With one mind, they give with generosity; and in another buddha-land, the enlightening beings are likewise.

source_sentence: 滿中建立諸佛塔，　　於十劫中而供養，
translation: In the midst of this he built all kinds of buddha-tales And offered them to those who served him for ten eons.

source_sentence: 如恒河沙等諸佛；　　又造高塔如須彌，
translation: Like the buddhas of the Ganges River, they also built tall stupas as high as Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 其塔悉以七寶成，　　如是遍滿十千剎，
translation: The stupas were all made of the seven treasures, Pervading ten thousand buddha-lands like this.

source_sentence: 其數三十有六億，　　以赤栴檀及真珠，
translation: The thirty were six hundred million in number, made of red sandalwood and genuine pearls.

source_sentence: 造作傘蓋供養具，　　一一傘蓋能遍覆，
translation: They make canopies for offerings, Each canopy capable of covering all.

source_sentence: 百佛世界等諸國，　　真珠、旒蘇齊佛剎，
translation: In all the buddha-lands of the ten directions, As many as there are atoms in a hundred buddha-fields, All adorned with pearls and jewels.

source_sentence: 其數猶如恒河沙，　　於空復造金傘蓋，
translation: They are as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River, And likewise they create golden umbrellas and canopies in the sky.

source_sentence: 其數亦如恒河沙，　　色如紫磨真金像，
translation: Their number is also like the sands of the Ganges River, colored like purple polished gold images.

source_sentence: 各各遍照三千界，　　一一塔中設供養，
translation: Each of them illumined the 3,000 worlds, And in each tower they offered offerings.

source_sentence: 無量無邊無數劫。　　如上所作諸功德，
translation: For immeasurable, limitless, and incalculable kalpas, the virtues he had created thus were as numerous as those mentioned above.

source_sentence: 不及能發菩提心。　　如是能發菩提心，
translation: They will not be able to give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 住不放逸清淨戒，　　不及能持此佛名。
translation: Abiding in the pure precept of nonfrivolity, they're not as good as those who can uphold this Buddha's name.

source_sentence: 如是能持此佛名，　　又能憐愍諸眾生，
translation: Thus they can preserve the name of this buddha And also have compassion for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 所在諸方廣流布，　　教令受持佛名者，
translation: Wherever they are, they’re spread far and wide, Teaching those who preserve the Buddha’s name.

source_sentence: 彼於一切眾生中，　　為作福田猶如來。」
translation: Among all sentient beings, they are like the Tathāgata who creates a field of merit for them.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即說偈言：爾時，佛告舍利弗：「若有一心受持、讀誦、憶念不忘此佛名者，
translation: At that time, the World-honored One spoke these verses: Then the Buddha said to Śāriputra: If one wholeheartedly retains, recites, and remembers the name of this buddha,

source_sentence: 所生貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡諸怖畏等即得除滅，未生貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡諸怖畏者能令不生。」
translation: The fears of craving, anger, anger, and delusion that arise will then be removed, and the fears of craving, anger, and delusion that haven't yet arisen will be able to prevent them from arising.

source_sentence: 「此諸佛名等，　　能救護世間。
translation: The names of these buddhas are equal, able to save and protect the world.

source_sentence: 初夜誦一遍，　　思念佛而眠，
translation: He recited it once on the first watch of the night, thought of the Buddha, and slept.

source_sentence: 中夜誦一遍，　　後夜亦復然，
translation: He recites it once in the middle of the night, and repeats it again at night.

source_sentence: 如是晝三時，　　於初、中、後分，
translation: Thus, these three times of the day are during the first, middle, and last parts of the day.

source_sentence: 一時誦一遍，　　精勤不放逸。
translation: He recites it once at a time, exerting himself without laziness.

source_sentence: 誦此佛名故，　　常得見好夢，
translation: Because they recite the name of this buddha, They will always see beautiful dreams.

source_sentence: 惡鬼及惡人，　　不能得其便。
translation: Bad ghosts and bad people can't get an advantage over them.

source_sentence: 是故此佛名，　　能救護世間，
translation: That is why the name of this buddha Is able to save and protect the world.

source_sentence: 一切天樂神、　　夜叉、鳩槃茶、
translation: All the heavenly deities, yakṣas, kumbhāṇḍas,

source_sentence: 羅剎諸鬼神，　　不能起障礙。
translation: Rāṣṭrapāla demons and spirits can't create an obstruction.

source_sentence: 於此百佛名，　　常能念持者，
translation: Here are the names of these one hundred buddhas, Which can always be remembered.

source_sentence: 一切諸魔事，　　不能得其便。」
translation: All the demonic deeds won't get an advantage over them.

source_sentence: 爾時天帝釋，　　三十三天王，
translation: It was then that Indra, the ruler of the Trāyastriṃśa gods,

source_sentence: 整理身衣服，　　胡跪而合掌，
translation: He arranges his body and clothes, kneels down with his palms pressed together.

source_sentence: 白佛言：「世尊！　　我等常衛護，
translation: They said to the Buddha:

source_sentence: 受持佛名者，　　及四天大王，
translation: Those who preserve the Buddha’s name And the great kings of the four quarters,

source_sentence: 亦常護於彼，　　受持佛名者。
translation: He also always protects those who accept and uphold the Buddha’s name.

source_sentence: 唯除必定業，　　不可得救護，
translation: Except for certain actions, they cannot be rescued.

source_sentence: 一切天人中，　　無能加惡者。」
translation: Among all gods and humans, there's no one who can add evil.

source_sentence: 爾時一切智，　　出大微妙聲，
translation: At that time omniscience uttered a great subtle voice,

source_sentence: 八種和雅音，　　善美眾樂聞，
translation: Eight kinds of harmonious sounds Are beautiful to hear, pleasing the listeners.

source_sentence: 普告諸大眾：　　「速受此佛名，
translation: They said to the great assembly, “Should you accept the name of this buddha?

source_sentence: 於十方世界，　　所在廣流布，
translation: Wherever they are in the worlds of the ten directions, They spread widely.

source_sentence: 而作大法施，　　斷除眾生疑。」
translation: He makes a great gift of the Dharma to remove the doubts of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 大聖釋迦文，　　演說此法時，
translation: When the great sage Śākyamuni explained this teaching,

source_sentence: 三百諸比丘，　　悉得諸漏盡；
translation: Three hundred monks had completely extinguished the defilements.

source_sentence: 復有比丘尼，　　其數有四十，
translation: Again, there were bhikṣus and nuns, some forty in number.

source_sentence: 一切漏法盡，　　逮得阿羅漢；
translation: All the tainted dharmas will be extinguished, And they’ll attain arhatship.

source_sentence: 復有優婆塞，　　其數滿五千，
translation: There were also Upāsaka, More than five thousand in number.

source_sentence: 住勝歡喜心，　　獲果須陀洹；
translation: Abiding in a mind of overweening joy, they attain the fruit of stream-entry.

source_sentence: 復有優婆夷，　　其數千一百，
translation: Again, there were several thousand one hundred female laymen.

source_sentence: 皆遠離塵垢，　　而得法眼淨；
translation: They are all far removed from defilement And yet attain purity of the eye of truth.

source_sentence: 復有大天王，　　無量千萬眾，
translation: Again, there was the great celestial king With immeasurable thousands of myriadstical beings.

source_sentence: 於法王法中，　　得清淨法眼；
translation: In the Teaching of the King of Truth, They attain the pure eye of truth.

source_sentence: 如彼恒河沙，　　分之為三分，
translation: Like the sands of the Ganges River, they are divided into three parts:

source_sentence: 菩薩如一分，　　悉獲無生忍。
translation: Enlightening beings are like a part: They all attain the tolerance of nonorigination.

source_sentence: 三千大千剎，　　是時六震動，
translation: At the time of these six tremblings there were three thousand great one-thousand buddhas.

source_sentence: 諸山及高峯，　　大地皆震吼。
translation: The mountains and high peaks All shake the earth with thunder.

source_sentence: 於上虛空中，　　雨諸天妙花，
translation: In the sky above, it rains beautiful flowers from the gods.

source_sentence: 天、龍、非人等，　　喜聲悉遍滿。
translation: Gods, dragons, nonhumans, and so forth— The sound of joy fills them all.

source_sentence: 爾時帝釋天、　　目連、離波多、
translation: It was then that the god Indra, Maudgalyāyana, Revata,

source_sentence: 蛇奴、劫賓那、　　摩訶迦旃延，
translation: Snake slave, Kapphiṇa, Mahākātyāyana,

source_sentence: 及摩訶迦葉、　　漚樓頻迦葉，
translation: And Mahākāśyapa and Urubhi-kāśyapa.

source_sentence: 乃至那迦葉、　　富樓彌多羅、
translation: Up to Nāgaśyapa, Pūrvavideha,

source_sentence: 善吉、不見空、　　阿難陀、跋提、
translation: Sunetra, not seeing emptiness, Ānanda, Upāli,

source_sentence: 沓婆摩羅子，　　如是等大眾，
translation: Dharmarakṣa, such are the multitudes of people like this.

source_sentence: 二萬五千人，　　同聲白佛言：
translation: Twenty-five thousand people all said to the Buddha in unison,

source_sentence: 「釋師子法王，　　我盡精進力，
translation: “Śāriputra, the king of the Dharma, the lion of the Buddha, I have exhausted my energy.

source_sentence: 皆悉無有餘，　　以諸神通力，
translation: They all have no remainder, By the power of their spiritual powers.

source_sentence: 於無量世界，　　化作無量身，
translation: In boundless worlds They manifest infinite bodies,

source_sentence: 過無量佛剎，　　常說此佛名，
translation: Beyond infinite buddha-lands, He always teaches the names of these buddhas.

source_sentence: 亦如佛所說。」　　爾時佛世尊，
translation: It is exactly as the Buddha has taught.” Then the Buddha, the World-honored One, said:

source_sentence: 為令眾見故，　　示現大神通，
translation: For the sake of enabling others to see, He manifests great mystic powers.

source_sentence: 現無量億剎，　　以佛神通力，
translation: Manifesting innumerable billions of buddha-lands, By the spiritual power of Buddha’s enlightenment

source_sentence: 見釋師子王，　　處處而遍滿，
translation: Seeing the Buddha, the king of lions, Everywhere pervades everywhere.

source_sentence: 說此修多羅，　　亦如過去佛，
translation: He teaches that these sutras are like the buddhas of the past:

source_sentence: 所說無差別。　　佛告諸大眾：
translation: There are no distinctions in what they teach.” The Buddha addressed the great assembly,

source_sentence: 「我於無量劫，　　久善修神通，
translation: “For immeasurable kalpas I have cultivated my supernormal powers For a long time.

source_sentence: 於無上佛法，　　決定莫生疑。
translation: Don't doubt the unsurpassed Buddha's teaching, and don't doubt it for certain.

source_sentence: 安隱眾生故，　　速說此佛名，
translation: Because of the well-being of sentient beings, he quickly explains the names of these buddhas.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生等，　　永離生死苦。」
translation: It causes sentient beings and so forth to permanently part with the suffering of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即說佛名：「南無月光佛　南無阿閦佛　南無大莊嚴佛　南無多伽羅香佛　南無常照曜佛　南無栴檀德佛　南無最上佛　南無蓮花幢佛　南無蓮華生佛　南無寶聚佛　南無阿伽樓香佛　南無大精進佛　南無栴檀德佛　南無海佛　南無巨海佛　南無幢德佛　南無梵德佛　南無大香佛　南無大生佛　南無寶輞佛　南無阿彌陀佛　南無大施德佛　南無大金柱佛　南無大念佛　南無言無盡佛　南無常散花佛　南無大愛佛　南無師子香勝佛　南無養德佛　南無帝釋火炎佛　南無常樂德佛　南無師子華德佛　南無寂滅幢佛　南無戒王佛　南無普德佛　南無普德像佛　南無無憂德佛　南無優波羅香佛　南無大地佛　南無大龍德佛　南無清淨王佛　南無廣念佛　南無蓮花德佛　南無捨花佛　南無龍德佛　南無花聚佛　南無香象佛　南無常觀佛　南無正作佛　南無善住佛　南無尼瞿嚧陀王佛　南無無上王佛　南無月德佛　南無栴檀林佛　南無日藏佛　南無德藏佛　南無須彌力佛　南無摩尼藏佛　南無金剛王佛　南無威德佛　南無無壞佛　南無善見佛　南無精進德佛　南無大海佛　南無覆娑羅樹佛　南無跋瑳德佛　南無佛天佛　南無師子幢佛　南無毘頭德佛　南無無邊德佛　南無德智佛　南無厚德佛　南無花幢佛　南無象德佛　南無精進德佛　南無龍德佛　南無德生佛　南無寶聚佛　南無德婆瑳子佛　南無論義佛　南無普見佛　南無寶多羅佛　南無普捨佛　南無大供養德佛　南無大網佛　南無斷一切眾生疑王佛　南無寶德佛　南無普蓋佛　南無大蓋佛　南無勝德佛　南無千供養佛　南無寶蓮花奮迅佛　南無厚德佛　南無智幢佛　南無寶月德佛　南無尼瞿嚧陀婆瑳王佛　南無常德佛　南無普蓮花佛　南無平等德佛　南無龍護救濟佛爾時，

source_sentence: 佛告慧命舍利弗：「若有善男子、善女人聞佛名已，深信清淨、發菩提心，
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra the Wise Life: If there are good men and good women who hear the name of the Buddha, deeply believe in purity and give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 愛樂受持、晝夜精勤，讀誦書寫、廣為他說，得無量無邊廣大功德，得不退轉乃至速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，
translation: They take delight in memorizing it and diligently practice it day and night; they recite it, write it down, and extensively teach it to others. Attaining immeasurable, boundless great virtue, they attain nonregression until they quickly attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切眾魔不能嬈亂。」
translation: All the Māras won't disturb them.

source_sentence: 佛說是經已，慧命舍利弗，釋梵四王，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: When the Buddha had discoursed on this sutra, Śāriputra of Wisdom and Life, the four kings of Brahmā and Śakra, the monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, and laywomen came to that great assembly.

source_sentence: 天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅等，一切大眾聞此法已，皆大歡喜。
translation: All the gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, and so forth were greatly delighted when they heard this teaching.
